ModMetaData.name: Change Stuff Properties
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iCj5o7O.png[/img]
I made this mostly as a companion mod to my other stuff-mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2787438435]Stuff Mass Matters[/url] but when I got started I added other changeable properties as well. You can currently modify the following properties on all stuff, vanilla and modded:
[list] [*]Commonality [*]Mass [*]Market value [*]Beauty offset [*]Beauty multiplier [*]Sharp damage multiplier [*]Blunt damage multiplier [*]Sharp armor power [*]Blunt armor power [*]Heat armor power [*]Heat insulation [*]Cold insulation [*]Flammability [*]Flammability multiplier [*]Max hitpoints multiplier [/list]
If you have suggestions of other properties that you would like to be able to change just leave a comment and I'll look into adding it. If you want to change with more precision, try the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2218078784]Better Sliders[/url] mod
